lhsInfo.text: Constructor is an all-in-one platform for education and research. It is built to cater to the needs of schools, higher education, corporate training, alternative credentials and sports teams.
To address various downstream tasks in racing image analysis within Constructor SportsTech applications.
To utilize Nebius AI for pre-training a computer vision foundation model in a self-supervised fashion using an extensive, custom racing dataset.
The model, available on Hugging Face, allows the

to process one image during inference
